author: A_Brickset_user
title: A Must-Have for An Action Figure Collector
review:
I love this set because of the mask of telekinesis.
The Matoran construction is pretty cool, and it makes them almost super posable.
The Kolhii staff included is also pretty cool, and the Matoran can pass to each other and shoot goals.

author: Gus_263
title: The colors are awesome
review: The colors are awesome, but the mask no than  his old. The colors are white and black, and the mask, same of nuju. The joints don't moves very well, only when playing kohlii with the stick. He also have a disk. The matoran of 03 are good, but don't have le or onu, great matorans.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Matoran) - Kopeke Review
review:
This is a good figure to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has only 2 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has 25 pieces and it was 4 USD when it was on sale. That means that the price per piece ratio was 16 cents per piece which is a really good value for a figure like this.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8581-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the hands the legs and the feet can be adjusted. On the back of the torso is a gear which you can use to sviwel the torso to the right and/or to the left. This figure also has a hockey stick. This set also comes with a puck which you can put into the hockey stick very easily as well. I really like this figure - even if it doesn't do much.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
